department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The department is seeking an ICP-MS that includes components, delivery, installation, training, technical support, maintenance and warranty with optional 2-year extended warranty and annual maintenance
duration_in_months: He is expected to end before March 2024
full_summary:
**Title:** Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS) W0114-220012

**Reference Number:** WS3814028211-Doc3817165383

**Tender Status:** This tender is closed and no longer accepting submissions.

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites submissions for the procurement of an Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS) for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Scope of Work:**

The successful contractor will be required to provide an ICP-MS system that includes the following components:

* Components
* Delivery and installation
* Training and technical support
* Annual maintenance and extended warranty (optional)

**Bid Submission:**

Bids must be submitted on or before January 24, 2023, by 2:00 pm EST. Bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Amendment History:**

* Amendment 001 extended the posting period until January 31, 2023.
* Amendment 002 and 003 were raised to answer bidder's questions.

** Tender Requirements:**

The following trade agreements apply to this tender:
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Delivery:**

The ICP-MS system will be delivered to the Royal Military College of Canada in Ontario, Canada (excluding the National Capital Region).

**Contractor Contact Information:**

Sabrina Cheng
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
Phone: Not available
Email: <sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

**Notice URL:**

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15066145
